TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BasicProfileViolation extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a WSDL violation of the WSI Basic Profile version 1.1.
Gets a object that specifies whether the Web service declares that it conforms to the WSI Basic Profile version 1.1.
Docs.value: A object that specifies whether the Web service declares that it conforms to the WSI Basic Profile version 1.1.

Docs.summary: Gets a <xref:System.String> that provides a detailed description of the WSDL violation of the Basic Profile.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> that provides a detailed description of the WSDL violation of the Basic Profile.

Docs.summary: Represents WSDL elements that do not comply with the WSI Basic Profile version 1.1 specification.
Docs.value: A that contains the WSDL elements that do not comply with the WSI Basic Profile version 1.1 specification.

Docs.summary: Gets the identifier for the WSDL violation of the Basic Profile version 1.1 specification.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> that contains the identifier (For example, R2038) for the WSDL violation of the Basic Profile version 1.1 specification.

Docs.summary: Gets a <xref:System.String> object that describes the WSDL violation of the Basic Profile version 1.1 specification.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.String> object that describes the WSDL violation of the Basic Profile version 1.1 specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a <xref:System.String> that comprises information from <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolation.NormativeStatement%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolation.Details%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolation.Elements%2A>.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> that comprises information from <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolation.NormativeStatement%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolation.Details%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolation.Elements%2A>.
